sentences.sContent: This very recklessness makes me feel that these costly operations may be only the prelude to far larger events which impend on land.
sentences.sContent_eng: This very recklessness makes me feel that these costly operations may be only the prelude to far larger events which impend on land.
sentences.sCn: 这种孤注一掷的作法，使我感到这些代价重大的战役，也许正是陆上即将发生。

remMethod.val: im + pend (悬) → 悬在空中， 即将落下 → 即将发生

words.tran: 即将发生的；迫切的；悬挂的

trans.tranOther: (esp of something threatening) to be about to happen; be imminent
